Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.util.hooks

Interface IProtectionHookSpigot

All Known Implementing Classes:
GriefDefender2ProtectionHook, GriefPreventionProtectionHook, LandsProtectionHook, PlotSquared6ProtectionHook, PlotSquared7ProtectionHook, RedProtectProtectionHook, TownyProtectionHook, WorldGuard7ProtectionHook
public interface IProtectionHookSpigot
Represents a compatibility hook.
Author:
Pim

  • Method Details

    • canBreakBlock

      boolean canBreakBlock(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, org.bukkit.Location loc)
      Check if this compatibility hook allows a player to break blocks at a given location.
      Parameters:
      player - The (fake) player to check.
      loc - The location to check.
      Returns:
      True if the player is allowed to break blocks at the given location.

    • canBreakBlocksBetweenLocs

      boolean canBreakBlocksBetweenLocs(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, org.bukkit.World world, Cuboid cuboid)
      Check if this compatibility hook allows a player to break blocks in a given cuboid.
      Parameters:
      player - The (fake) player to check.
      world - The world to check in.
      cuboid - The cuboid to check.
      Returns:
      True if the player is allowed to break all the blocks in the given cuboid.

    • getName

      String getName()
      Get the name of the JavaPlugin that is being hooked into.
      Returns:
      The name of the JavaPlugin that is being hooked into.
